name: Cubanacan - Habano - Piramide
additionalNotes: Cubanacan begins their history in Cuba, but now the cigars are made by hand in the soil of Esteli. One thing is certain about the Cubanacan Habano, it is a rich smoke with full flavor. It is a cigar filled with rich and creamy flavors combined with a rich, smooth, cedar flavor with wood taste with notes
